text: A Stranger Among Us, also known as Close to Eden, is a 1992 American crime drama movie directed by Sidney Lumet and starring Melanie Griffith, Eric Thal, Mia Sara, Tracy Pollan, John Pankow, James Gandolfini and Chris Latta. It was distributed by Hollywood Pictures and was a box office failure. ==Other websites== * * Category:1992 crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Movies directed by Sidney Lumet Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies about Orthodox and Hasidic Jews Category:Disney movies
title: A Stranger Among Us
